loc_darkwood_clearing.name: Clearing in the Dark Woods
loc_darkwood_clearing.description: A serene meadow within the forest, known for its vibrant flowers and relaxing atmosphere.

loc_darkwood_forest.name: Darkwood Forest
loc_darkwood_forest.description: A dense forest filled with towering trees and lurking dangers. The howls of wolves echo among the shadows.

tent_old_man.name: Old Man's Camp Site
tent_old_man.description: A small campsite with a worn tent and a faintly glowing campfire.
